verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>, <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem<s%>, <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> Most <S%G5310>High<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G5290>returning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2871>slaughter<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3307>divided<s%> a tenth <S%G1181>part<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> (being <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G3303><s%> by <S%G2059>interpretation<s%>, <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem<s%>, which <S%G3603>is<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%>;

without <S%G540>father<s%>, without <S%G282>mother<s%>, without <S%G35>genealogy<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> made <S%G871>like<s%> unto the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>), <S%G3306>abideth<s%> a priest2409, 1519 <S%G1336>continually<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2334>consider<s%> how <S%G4080>great<s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3739>was<s%>, unto whom <S%G2532><s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, the <S%G3966>patriarch<s%>, <S%G1325>gave<s%> a <S%G1181>tenth<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the chief <S%G2334>spoils<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they indeed3303, 2983 <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%> that <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G2405>priest<s%>'s office <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to take tithes <S%G586>of<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G80>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2539>though<s%> these have come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3751>loins<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> he whose genealogy <S%G1075>is<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1075>counted<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> hath taken <S%G1183>tithes<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> hath <S%G2127>blessed<s%> him that <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G485>dispute<s%> the <S%G1640>less<s%> is <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2909>better<s%>.

And2532, Ezekiel3 <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1181>tithes<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3140>one<s%>, of whom it is <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2198>liveth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, <S%G5613>so<s%> to <S%G2031>say<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3017>Levi<s%>, who <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G1181>tithes<s%>, hath paid <S%G1183>tithes<s%>;
for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3751>loins<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Now <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3767>there<s%> <S%G3303>was<s%> perfection5050, 2258 <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3020>Levitical<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G1909>under<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> hath the <S%G2992>people<s%> received the <S%G3549>law<s%>), <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2089>further<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> was there <S%G450>that<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> should <S%G450>arise<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G3004>reckoned<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> being <S%G3346>changed<s%>, there is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%> a <S%G3331>change<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3348>he<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> are <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3348>belongeth<s%> <S%G5443>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> hath given <S%G4337>attendance<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G4271>evident<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> hath <S%G393>sprung<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2448>Judah<s%>; as <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2420>priests<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> what we say <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4054>more<s%> abundantly <S%G2612>evident<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3665>likeness<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> there <S%G450>ariseth<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%>,

who <S%G3739><s%> hath been <S%G1096>made<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>a<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2222>an<s%> <S%G179>endless<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G3754>witnessed<s%> of <S%G4771>him<s%>, Thou art a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>After<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there is1096, Ezekiel3 a <S%G115>disannulling<s%> of a <S%G4254>foregoing<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G772>weakness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G512>unprofitableness<s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%>), and <S%G1680>a<s%> bringing <S%G1898>in<s%> thereupon of <S%G1680>a<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we draw <S%G1448>nigh<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2596>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> it is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the taking of an <S%G3728>oath<s%>

(for1063, Ezekiel3 they indeed have <S%G1526>been<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3660>sware<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3338>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3338>repent<s%> <S%G4771>himself<s%>, Thou art a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>);
by <S%G2596><s%> so <S%G5118>much<s%> also <S%G1096>hath<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G1450>surety<s%> of <S%G1242>a<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> have <S%G1526>been<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> in <S%G1223>number<s%>, because that by <S%G2288>death<s%> they are <S%G2967>hindered<s%> from <S%G3887>continuing<s%>:
but1161, 3588 <S%G846>he<s%>, <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>, <S%G2192>hath<s%> his <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> <S%G531>unchangeable<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3838>uttermost<s%> <S%G3838>them<s%> that draw <S%G4334>near<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, seeing <S%G2198>he<s%> <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> make <S%G1793>intercession<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G4241>became<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, <S%G3741>holy<s%>, <S%G172>guileless<s%>, <S%G283>undefiled<s%>, <S%G5563>separated<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5308>higher<s%> than the <S%G3772>heavens<s%>;

who3739, 2192 <S%G318>needeth<s%> not3756, 2596 <S%G2250>daily<s%>, <S%G5618>like<s%> those high <S%G749>priests<s%>, to offer <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%>, <S%G4386>first<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>, and <S%G1899>then<s%> for the sins of the <S%G2992>people<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G399>all<s%>, when he offered up <S%G1438>himself<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2525>appointeth<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> high <S%G749>priests<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G769>infirmity<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G3728>oath<s%>, which <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, appointeth a <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G5048>perfected<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>evermore<s%>.
